languages.text: {n}Кажется, еще миг — и он набросится на вас. Но тут в безумных глазах мелькает узнавание, а голос стихает, словно арбитра покинули все силы.{/n}
{n}It seems Solomorne is a breath away from lunging for you next. But recognition glimmers in those deranged eyes and his voice goes quiet, as if all his strength has fled him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кажется, еще миг — и он набросится на вас. Но тут в безумных глазах мелькает узнавание, а голос стихает, словно арбитра покинули все силы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは今にもあなたに飛びかかろうとしているかにみえた。だが、錯乱したその目にかすかな理解の光が宿り、声は力を失ったように静まり返った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems Solomorne is a breath away from lunging for you next. But recognition glimmers in those deranged eyes and his voice goes quiet, as if all his strength has fled him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは今にもあなたに飛びかかろうとしているかにみえた。だが、錯乱したその目にかすかな理解の光が宿り、声は力を失ったように静まり返った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne scheint nur einen Atemzug davon entfernt zu sein, sich als Nächstes auf dich zu stürzen. Aber in seinem wahnsinnigen Blick funkelt Erkennen, und seine Stimme wird ruhig, als hätten ihn alle Kräfte verlassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems Solomorne is a breath away from lunging for you next. But recognition glimmers in those deranged eyes and his voice goes quiet, as if all his strength has fled him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne scheint nur einen Atemzug davon entfernt zu sein, sich als Nächstes auf dich zu stürzen. Aber in seinem wahnsinnigen Blick funkelt Erkennen, und seine Stimme wird ruhig, als hätten ihn alle Kräfte verlassen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il se prépare à fondre sur vous, mais un éclat de lucidité traverse son regard dément. Ses forces semblent le quitter et sa voix se fait plus faible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems Solomorne is a breath away from lunging for you next. But recognition glimmers in those deranged eyes and his voice goes quiet, as if all his strength has fled him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il se prépare à fondre sur vous, mais un éclat de lucidité traverse son regard dément. Ses forces semblent le quitter et sa voix se fait plus faible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parece que Solomorne está a un pelo de lanzarse sobre ti. Pero entonces ves un brillo de reconocimiento en su mirada iracunda y de repente guarda silencio, como si le hubieran abandonado las fuerzas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems Solomorne is a breath away from lunging for you next. But recognition glimmers in those deranged eyes and his voice goes quiet, as if all his strength has fled him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parece que Solomorne está a un pelo de lanzarse sobre ti. Pero entonces ves un brillo de reconocimiento en su mirada iracunda y de repente guarda silencio, como si le hubieran abandonado las fuerzas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙仿佛下一刻就要朝你扑过来，但随后，他疯狂的目光中流露出一丝神智。他的声音变得平静下来，仿佛突然失去了所有力量。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems Solomorne is a breath away from lunging for you next. But recognition glimmers in those deranged eyes and his voice goes quiet, as if all his strength has fled him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙仿佛下一刻就要朝你扑过来，但随后，他疯狂的目光中流露出一丝神智。他的声音变得平静下来，仿佛突然失去了所有力量。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un sana saldırmasına ramak kaldığını fark ediyorsun. Ancak kendisinin o öfke dolu gözleri seni tanır gibi oluyor ve sanki tüm gücünü yitirmişçesine sesi kısılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It seems Solomorne is a breath away from lunging for you next. But recognition glimmers in those deranged eyes and his voice goes quiet, as if all his strength has fled him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un sana saldırmasına ramak kaldığını fark ediyorsun. Ancak kendisinin o öfke dolu gözleri seni tanır gibi oluyor ve sanki tüm gücünü yitirmişçesine sesi kısılıyor.{/n}
